item.title: Ubuntu Install
item.description: How to Install Ubuntu As one of the popular open-source operating systems, Ubuntu is a good choice for users who want to try a new operating system. Here are the steps to install Ubuntu on your computer. Preparation Download the Ubuntu installation file from the official website Download Ubuntu Desktop | Download | Ubuntu. Choose the version that suits your needs. Create a bootable USB or DVD. You can use applications like Rufus or Etcher to create a bootable USB.
